transformations.name: EPSData
transformations.description: Généré automatiquement par les actions d'aperçu de données

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		marque_id as string,
		marque_name as string,
		canal_final as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		no_offre as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		NoCli as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		qt_plateforme_final as string,
		ca_plateforme_final as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BCUnion
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ArticleHierarchi
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Plateformes
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtractionCompte
source(output(
		Client as string,
		BrandID as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ClientEHS
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		ATC as string,
		canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		Right_Produit as string,
		{Right_Quantité} as string,
		{Right_Numéro interne 1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StgOffreUnique
renameAndRepositionColumns derive({ATC 2} = iif(isNull({ATC 2}),'',{ATC 2}),
		{ATC 1} = iif(isNull({ATC 1}),'',{ATC 1})) ~> Cleansing
Cleansing derive(ATC = iif(distributeur!='vente directe', 
 iif({ATC 2}!='', {ATC 2}, {ATC 1}),
  iif({ATC Corrigé}!='', {ATC Corrigé}, iif({ATC 2}!='', {ATC 2}, {ATC 1}))),
		source_atc = iif(isNull({ATC 2})||{ATC 2}!='0','[ATC 2]','[ATC 1]')) ~> AtcSOurceATC
AtcSOurceATC derive(marque_id = marque_id) ~> MarqueID
ArticleHierarchi select(mapColumn(
		OrgCm,
		CDis,
		reference = Article,
		Description,
		{Hiérarch.groupe},
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Predecessor,
		Successor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Déb. val.},
		N1groupe = {N1.groupe},
		N2groupe = {N2.groupe},
		N3groupe = {N3.groupe},
		N4groupe = {N4.groupe},
		N5groupe = {N5.groupe},
		N6groupe = {N6.groupe},
		N7groupe = {N7.groupe},
		N1locale = {N1.locale},
		N2locale = {N2.locale},
		N3locale = {N3.locale},
		N4locale = {N4.locale},
		N5locale = {N5.locale},
		N6locale = {N6.locale},
		N7locale = {N7.locale},
		N1groupedesignation = {N1.groupe.designation},
		N2groupedesignation = {N2.groupe.designation},
		N3groupedesignation = {N3.groupe.designation},
		N4groupedesignation = {N4.groupe.designation},
		N5groupedesignation = {N5.groupe.designation},
		N6groupedesignation = {N6.groupe.designation},
		N7groupedesignation = {N7.groupe.designation},
		N1localedesignation = {N1.locale.designation},
		N2localedesignation = {N2.locale.designation},
		N3localedesignation = {N3.locale.designation},
		N4localedesignation = {N4.locale.designation},
		N5localedesignation = {N5.locale.designation},
		N6localedesignation = {N6.locale.designation},
		N7localedesignation = {N7.locale.designation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameReference
renameReference aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		Description),
	Successor = max(Successor),
		CDis = max(CDis),
		OrgCm = max(OrgCm),
		Predecessor = max(Predecessor),
		St = max(St),
		{Désignation Statut} = max({Désignation Statut}),
		{Deb val} = max({Déb. val.}),
		N1groupe = max(N1groupe),
		N2groupe = max(N2groupe),
		N3groupe = max(N3groupe),
		N4groupe = max(N4groupe),
		N5groupe = max(N5groupe),
		N6groupe = max(N6groupe),
		N7groupe = max(N7groupe),
		N1groupedesignation = max(N1groupedesignation),
		N2groupedesignation = max(N2groupedesignation),
		N3groupedesignation = max(N3groupedesignation),
		N4groupedesignation = max(N4groupedesignation),
		N5groupedesignation = max(N5groupedesignation),
		N6groupedesignation = max(N6groupedesignation),
		N7groupedesignation = max(N7groupedesignation),
		N1localedesignation = max(N1localedesignation),
		N2localedesignation = max(N2localedesignation),
		N3localedesignation = max(N3localedesignation),
		N4localedesignation = max(N4localedesignation),
		N5localedesignation = max(N5localedesignation),
		N6localedesignation = max(N6localedesignation),
		N7localedesignation = max(N7localedesignation),
		N1locale = max(N1locale),
		N2locale = max(N2locale),
		N3locale = max(N3locale),
		N4locale = max(N4locale),
		N5locale = max(N5locale),
		N6locale = max(N6locale),
		N7locale = max(N7locale),
		{Hiérarchgroupe} = max({Hiérarch.groupe}),
		{Hiérarchlocale} = max({Hiérarch.locale})) ~> UniqueReferenc
MarqueID, UniqueReferenc join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(renameAndRepositionColumns@reference, " ", ""))),replace(renameAndRepositionColumns@reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(UniqueReferenc@reference, " ", ""))),replace(UniqueReferenc@reference, " ", "")),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinArticle
MarqueID, UniqueReferenc join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(renameAndRepositionColumns@reference, " ", ""))),replace(renameAndRepositionColumns@reference, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(UniqueReferenc@reference, " ", ""))),replace(UniqueReferenc@reference, " ", "")),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinArticle
toDoubleCA derive(qt_final = coalesce(qt_ecc_enrichi ,{qte plateforme final}  ),
		ca_final = coalesce( ca_ecc_enrichi, {ca plateforme final} ),
		canal_distribution_final = id_canal_final) ~> QtFinalCaFinalCanalDistributin
RenameCaFinal derive(ca_ecc_enrichi = toDouble(ca_ecc_enrichi),
		{ca plateforme final} = toDouble({ca plateforme final})) ~> toDoubleCA
QtFinalCaFinalCanalDistributin derive(year = substring(yearmonth,1,4),
		month = substring(yearmonth,5,2)) ~> ExtractYearandMonth
Plateformes derive(Distributeur = lower(WholeSalerID),
		Dist = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> Distributeur
Distributeur derive(Distributeur = iif(Distributeur=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',
  iif(instr(Distributeur, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva', 
   iif(instr(Distributeur, 'dsc')>0, 'dsc', 
    iif(instr(Distributeur, 'vf' )>0, 'vf', 
     iif(instr(Distributeur, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',
Dist)))))) ~> distributeurr
distributeurr select(mapColumn(
		HubSAPid,
		t_distrubuteur = Distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameDistributeur
ExtractYearandMonth, RenameDistributeur join(RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid == RenameDistributeur@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPlateforme
JoinPlateforme derive(distributeur = iif(isNull(RenameDistributeur@HubSAPid),distributeur, 'plateforme '+t_distrubuteur)) ~> CDistributeur
CDistributeur derive(POSSAMidString = coalesce(POSSAMidString , RenameCaFinal@HubSAPid)) ~> PossmidString
ExtractionCompte, SelectNomClient union(byName: true)~> UnionClientEHSandExtractionCompte
UnionClientEHSandExtractionCompte aggregate(groupBy({Numéro du compte}),
	{Nom du compte} = max({Nom du compte}),
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} = max({Groupe cible/Typologie générale}),
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} = max({Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée}),
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} = max({Compte principal: Numéro du compte}),
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} = max({Compte principal: Nom du compte})) ~> AgregatNumeroCompte
ClientEHS select(mapColumn(
		{Numéro du compte} = Client,
		{Nom du compte} = Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNomClient
PossmidString, EPSData join(toInteger(POSSAMidString) == {Numéro du compte},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCompte
choiceColumns derive({affecte/non_affecte} = iif(  ( data_origin =="vente directe") , "affecté" , 
   iif(  ( data_origin == "facturation decrementé"  || data_origin=="facturation sans matching" || data_origin=="decrementation ecoulement sans matching") ,
    "non affecté" ,
      iif( ( (distributeur == "plateforme dsc" || distributeur == "plateforme tereva") && data_origin == "facturation" ), "non affecté", "affecté")
    )  
)) ~> affecteNonaffecte
affecteNonaffecte derive({id marque} = marque_id) ~> IdMarque
IdMarque derive({nom du canal} = iif(canal_distribution_final=='45', 'FP', 
 iif(canal_distribution_final=='51', 'FS', 
  iif(canal_distribution_final=='43', 'FC', 'FD')))) ~> NomDuCanal
NomDuCanal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code client livré} = POSSAMidString,
		{code client plateforme livree} = HubSAPid,
		{code produit} = reference,
		{plateforme/vente directe} = distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		marque = marque_name,
		qte_ecc = qte_ecoulement,
		{Canal distribution} = id_canal_final,
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		qt_ecc_enrichi,
		ca_ecc_enrichi,
		quantite = qt_final,
		ca = ca_final,
		{origine de la ligne} = data_origin,
		canal_final,
		no_offre,
		{ATC offre} = {ATC 2},
		{ATC livré} = {ATC 1},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		id_canal_final,
		{qte plateforme final},
		{ca plateforme final},
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		marque_code = marque_id,
		{Document de vente} = document_vente,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		marque_id,
		{ATC Performance} = ATC,
		source_atc,
		Successor,
		CDis,
		Predecessor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Deb val},
		Description,
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		t_distrubuteur,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{id marque},
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameDistrib
RenameDistrib filter(N1locale=="FA"||
N1locale=="FB"||
N1locale=="FC"||
N1locale=="FD"||
N1locale=="FE"||
N1locale=="FG"||
N1locale=="FH"||
N1locale=="FL"||
N1locale=="FM"||
N1locale=="FP"||
N1locale=="FR"||
N1locale=="FV") ~> FiltrerN1Locale
JoinArticle select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference = renameAndRepositionColumns@reference,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		marque_id,
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente = {Document de vente},
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		ca_ecc_enrichi = ca_final,
		qt_ecc_enrichi = qt_final,
		{qte plateforme final} = qt_plateforme_final,
		{ca plateforme final} = ca_plateforme_final,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		data_origin,
		canal_final,
		id_canal_final,
		no_offre,
		{ATC 2},
		{ATC 1},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		ATC,
		source_atc,
		Successor,
		CDis,
		OrgCm,
		Predecessor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Deb val},
		Description,
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameCaFinal
LeftJoinArticle filter(isNull(UniqueReferenc@reference)) ~> FiltreReferenceNull
FiltrerN1Locale select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{Code postal},
		marque,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		document_vente,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		Facture,
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		qt_ecc_enrichi,
		ca_ecc_enrichi,
		quantite,
		ca,
		{origine de la ligne},
		canal_final,
		no_offre,
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{qte plateforme final},
		{ca plateforme final},
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		marque_code,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		{ATC Performance},
		source_atc,
		Successor,
		CDis,
		Predecessor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Deb val},
		Description,
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		t_distrubuteur,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{id marque},
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns
renameColumns, RenameNUmeroInterne join(canal_final == canal
	&& no_offre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStgOffreUnique
AgregatNumeroCompte derive({Numéro du compte} = toInteger({Numéro du compte})) ~> EPSData
uniqueCanalAndOffre select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		{Numéro client indirect} = {Numéro interne 1},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		ATC,
		canal,
		Produit,
		{Numéro interne 2},
		Right_Produit,
		{Right_Quantité},
		{Right_Numéro interne 1}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameNUmeroInterne
JoinStgOffreUnique, EPSData join(toInteger({Numéro client indirect}) == EPSData@{Numéro du compte},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinEPS
BCUnion select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,

source(output(
		{Société} as string,
		{Dépot} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Code GTAC} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Valeur as string,
		{Quantité n-1} as string,
		{Valeur n-1} as string,
		{CP Dépôt} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'fname',
	wildcardPaths:['Ecoulement/Maillard/*.csv']) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Agence (Code)} as string,
		{CP Agence} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
ecoulement filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive({Quantité} = toDouble(replace({Quantité}, ",", "."))) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble(qte_ecoulement),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " "),
		Article = trim(reference, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity
yearmonthSplit, typeCaste join(yearmonthSplit@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(yearmonth = toString(yearmonth),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
yearmonthSplit, typeCaste join(yearmonthSplit@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Quantité} = iif({Quantité}-{Qté ventes directes} >0 , {Quantité}-{Qté ventes directes}, toDouble(0))) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Société},
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dépôt},
		year = Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = fullLeftUnion@Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> yearmonthSplit
typeCaste filter(Article=='001002624'&& {Code client}=='16010144') ~> filter2
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique0} as string,
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique1} as string,
		SaunierDuval as string,
		{01000} as string,
		{01999} as string,
		{nicolas hernandez} as string,
		{Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique} as string,
		{01} as string,
		{1647-Rhône-Alpes Auvergne} as string,
		{16400092} as string,
		{nicolas julien} as string,
		{SD diffus} as string,
		{NICOLAS Julien} as string,
		{16566798} as string,
		Prop_14 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MAILLARDECOULPREPARED
outerleftOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
